title: Google\Cloud\Deploy\V1\Stage
name: Stage
description:
Stage specifies a location to which to deploy.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.deploy.v1.Stage

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.target_id
params.description: The target_id to which this stage points. This field refers exclusively to the last segment of a target name. For example, this field would just be my-target (rather than projects/project/locations/location/targets/my-target). The location of the Target is inferred to be the same as the location of the DeliveryPipeline that contains this Stage.

params.name: data.profiles
params.description: Skaffold profiles to use when rendering the manifest for this stage's Target.

params.name: data.strategy
params.description: Optional. The strategy to use for a Rollout to this stage.
